/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a car on the road, giving a driver's eye view of the scene. The street is lined with lush green trees and bushes, adding a touch of nature to the urban landscape. Power lines crisscross above, forming an intricate web against the clear blue sky. Buildings of various sizes and designs flank the road, their facades reflecting the architectural diversity of the city. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
